thread.title: Bereaved women step closer to changing dangerous driving law
thread.title_full: Bereaved women step closer to changing dangerous driving law | Meridian - ITV News

author: itv.com
title: Bereaved women step closer to changing dangerous driving law
text:
Two women whose partners were killed by a drunk driver have today moved a step closer in their campaign for a change in the law.
Tracey Fidler and Hayley Lindsay, from Berkshire, along with their local MP Alok Sharma, met the Prisons Minister in London.
They're calling for tougher sentences for those who cause death by irresponsible driving.
As Sam Holder reports.
Play video Sam spoke to campaigners Tracey Fidler and Hayley Lindsay as well as MP Alok Sharma.
Last updated Wed 22 Feb 2017 Berkshire
